name: Cloud Pet
description: Cloud Pet brings crypto adoption to the main stream with new concept such as trade to earn, payment system, NFTs market place, Crypto wallet, online shopping mall, decentralized exchange and chart tools Cloud Pet is designed to become more scared over time by burning the CPET used to shop on Cloud Pet Mall, 50% trading generated from market place would be use to buy back tokens and burn quarterly. Stake your Cpet and Watch your CPET grow with APY upto 300%. Use Cpet Token anytime you shop on Cloud Pet Mall and get 15% discount.
